Text: ...Gotcha.
Cid grabs Olivier's arm...
and pulls her toward him with all his might.

The veins on his hand pop where it grips hers.
His muscles bulge in stark definition as he
pushes himself past his limit with a scream.
Olivier pauses for just a moment.
Just close enough to use a half-broken sword.

Olivier leans back to avoid the swipe Cid makes at
the arteries in her neck with his blade.
But doing so ruins her center of gravity.

Cid drops his sword and throws his arms around Olivier
in a vice grip.
Then,
he bites down on her carotid artery.
*gasp*
Wha...!

Cid't teeth cut into her slender neck and sink
into the artery.

He holds her tightly, chewing away as he restrains
her flailing arms.
With each bite, Olivier's body jerks and spasms.
What...!
The hero eventually goes limp

and shatters like a mirror, crumbling away to
nothingness.
*gasp*
How could Olivier be beaten...?!
Cid's abdominal wound appears nothing short of fatal.

The fact that he is even breathing is strange enough,
but being able to defeat Olivier while in such a state
is positively inhuman.
Bastard...! How is it that you live?!

Hey, the human body is pretty tough so long as you
keep the right places safe.

You can even survive a sword through the guts if you
make sure it misses any arteries and major organs.
Pretty sick, don't you think?
"Sick"...?

Yeah. Just keep your vitals protected, and you don't
have to bother with dodging.

Then rip out the other guy's throat with your teeth
while being stabbed in the gut. The counterattack
become pretty much unavoidable.
...Are you insane?

Nelson makes a face like he has behold something
abhorrent.
Are you all right...?
Cid nods in response to Aurora's show of concern.
Now then...
With that elf chick gone,
I take it you're next, Gramps?
F-Fine, I give up! I was wrong, I repent!!!
Nelson bows his head...but begins to chuckle.
...Is that what you were hoping I would say?
Hm?

I will admit, I was surprised to see an urchin with
no magic fell the mighty Olivier.

Luck though it most certainly was, a victory is still
a victory. Congratulations.
Nelson claps his hands.
Why, thank you.
Cid mockingly returns the applause.

I suggest you not get too full of yourself over
besting a single inferior clone.

Fathomless reservoirs of magic rest within the
Sanctuary...
which is why even feats such as this are possible.
Suddenly, Oliver returns, bathed in light.
But there isn't just one of her.

Countless Oliviers appear, so many that they threaten
to fill the entire ruin.
No!
Aurora cries out.

Though Cid's wound isn't quite fatal, it is undeniably
grievous. There is no way he is fit for battle.
This...
is the power of the Sanctuary!!!
